name: MikutsCV
first: My research papers from Alchemy University...
Too bad I'm some poor bastard from village and needed to dropout.
And also my job application for the Arch Alchemy's alchemy courier position.
Not like it matters anyway. They let anyone in there, probably 'cuz of how dangerous it is, but I realy need that money.
I should probably tidy up the room, and not let papers like this just lie there.
other: I should probably tidy up in here.
